markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Rusty Mae](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1550)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 37

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Rusty Mae](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1550)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Hag" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=84" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 14</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +19, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** +4

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +5
</row>

**[Coven](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=11)** Rusty Mae adds [_earthbind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [_passwall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=216), and [_spellwrack_](/Spells.aspx?ID=298) to her coven's spells.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +19 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 155

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except bludgeoning)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claws +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [cold iron](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+13 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) and rust

**Divine Rituals** DC 29

- **5th**
[Planar Ally](/Rituals.aspx?ID=16)

**Bonds of Iron** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Once per day, an annis hag can cause a cage built of cold iron fingernails to spring out of nothingness at a range of up to 30 feet, attempting an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) against the target's Fortitude DC; if the target has a weakness to [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=272), the annis hag gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this check. Unlike a normal Grapple, the annis hag doesn't need to be within reach and can move as she pleases, and a successful attempt lasts until the creature escapes (DC 24), causing the cage to crumble into rust. Any creature can attempt to destroy the cage by attacking it. It has an AC of 29, Hardness 14, and 56 Hit Points.

**Change Shape** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The hag can take on the appearance of any Medium female [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91). This doesn't change her Speed or her attack and damage bonuses with her Strikes but might change the damage type her Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

**[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30)** <actions string="Single Action" />  claw

**Rust**   Rusty Mae's claws cause metal to rapidly rust and corrode. If she succeeds at a claws Strike or [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) attempt, she deals 2d6 damage (doubled on a critical hit) to a metal item the target is wearing or holding, ignoring its Hardness, in addition to the damage she deals to the target with her claws. If she hits an unattended metal item, the item takes 2d6 damage automatically. If a creature uses the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction with a metal shield against Rusty Mae's claw attack, the shield is automatically broken, but no other item is affected on that attack.

</column>
name: Rusty Mae

text: Rusty Mae Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 37 Unspecific Lore : DC 35 Specific Lore : DC 32 Rusty Mae Source Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn pg. 14 Perception +22; darkvision Languages Aklo, Common, Infernal, Jotun Skills Acrobatics +17, Athletics +21, Deception +19, Diplomacy +21, Intimidation +17, Religion +22, Stealth +19 Str +7 Dex +5 Con +5 Int +4 Wis +6 Cha +5 Coven Rusty Mae adds earthbind , passwall , and spellwrack to her coven's spells. --- AC 30 Fort +22 Ref +16 Will +19 +1 status to all saves vs. magic HP 155 Resistances physical 10 (except bludgeoning) --- Speed 40 feet Melee Single Action claws +23 (Agile, cold iron, Magical, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+13 slashing plus Grab and rust Divine Rituals DC 29 - 5th Planar Ally Bonds of Iron Two Actions (Attack, Conjuration, Occult) Once per day, an annis hag can cause a cage built of cold iron fingernails to spring out of nothingness at a range of up to 30 feet, attempting an Athletics check to Grapple against the target's Fortitude DC; if the target has a weakness to cold iron, the annis hag gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this check. Unlike a normal Grapple, the annis hag doesn't need to be within reach and can move as she pleases, and a successful attempt lasts until the creature escapes (DC 24), causing the cage to crumble into rust. Any creature can attempt to destroy the cage by attacking it. It has an AC of 29, Hardness 14, and 56 Hit Points. Change Shape Single Action (Concentrate, Occult, Polymorph, Transmutation) The hag can take on the appearance of any Medium female humanoid. This doesn't change her Speed or her attack and damage bonuses with her Strikes but might change the damage type her Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning). Rend Single Action claw Rust Rusty Mae's claws cause metal to rapidly rust and corrode. If she succeeds at a claws Strike or Disarm attempt, she deals 2d6 damage (doubled on a critical hit) to a metal item the target is wearing or holding, ignoring its Hardness, in addition to the damage she deals to the target with her claws. If she hits an unattended metal item, the item takes 2d6 damage automatically. If a creature uses the Shield Block reaction with a metal shield against Rusty Mae's claw attack, the shield is automatically broken, but no other item is affected on that attack.
